alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 6:23PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northern Ashtabula and northern Erie Counties Until 745 PM EST.... At 618 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band extending from Ashtabula, to Erie Pennsylvania, to the New York state line, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Winds to 40 mph... Locations impacted include... Erie, Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, North East, Girard, North Kingsville, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Kingsville, Platea, McKean, Edgewood, Northwest Harborcr, Avonia and Plymouth Center. This will impact Interstate 90, Interstate 86, and Route 20. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
